pci_databases_maintenances_description: Below you will find a list of maintenance operations for your service. You can apply scheduled maintenance immediately, or wait for it to be applied automatically.
pci_databases_maintenances_maintenance_a: An error has occurred applying maintenance
pci_databases_maintenances_update_time_s: The maintenance time has been updated successfully, and will be applied to future maintenance.
pci_databases_maintenances_update_time_e: An error has occurred updating the maintenance time
